name: amish tomato ketchup  for canning
ingredients: tomato juice, apple cider vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper, clove oil, cinnamon oil, dry mustard
instructions: mix all ingredients& boil for 2 1 / 2 hours , or until thick, pour into jars', i use 'old' glass ketchup bottles, it is not necessary for these to seal, my amish mother-in-law has been making this her entire life , and has never used a sealed  jar for this recipe , and it's always been great!
